index_hero_description: Discover how ancient Egyptian knowledge meets modern innovation. At SIA, we combine the timeless intelligence of the past with today's technology — helping you learn, grow, and build a future powered by wisdom and skill.
index_about_description: SIA (Self Intelligence Analyzer) is a platform that guides you to understand your personality traits, learning style, and professional potential. By combining personality analysis with curated learning resources, SIA empowers you to make informed decisions for your personal and professional growth.
index_feature_personality_desc: Interactive test to evaluate your traits and learning style.
index_feature_dashboard_desc: Visualize insights and key takeaways from your analysis.
index_feature_resources_desc: Access personalized courses, books, YouTube channels, and roadmap.
index_feature_admin_desc: Manage assessments, users, and reports (for administrators).
index_step_01_desc: Create your account to start your journey.
index_step_03_desc: Explore your dashboard for tailored recommendations.
index_step_04_desc: Learn, grow, and track your progress.
test_big_five_desc: Understand your personality traits based on the Five-Factor Model: Openness, Conscientiousness, Extraversion, Agreeableness, and Neuroticism.
test_holland_desc: Discover your career interests and ideal work environments based on the RIASEC model: Realistic, Investigative, Artistic, Social, Enterprising, and Conventional.
profile_stay_aligned: Stay aligned with your personalized roadmap. Update your profile to keep recommendations accurate.
profile_personality_desc: Big Five and Holland Codes insights will appear here once available.
profile_career_desc: We will surface AI-aligned matches based on your strengths.
profile_final_analysis_desc: Comprehensive career recommendations with personalized roadmaps and learning resources.
profile_saved_careers_desc: Your favorite paths stay pinned here.
profile_account_desc: Manage security or close your account securely.
profile_new_password_hint: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
admin_results_coming: Results and reports interface coming soon...

admin_select_user: Select a user to view details
about_hero_title: SIA — Ancient Wisdom for Modern Careers
about_hero_lead: In a fast-changing world, choosing a career path can be hard. SIA blends ancient wisdom with modern analytics to help you discover your strengths and choose the right path.
about_overview_text: SIA uses Big Five + Holland Codes, links results to job market data, and gives personalized learning recommendations.
about_what_we_do_1: Psychometric analysis models tuned for emerging talent.
about_what_we_do_2: Research-driven knowledge base aligned to Egypt & MENA trends.
about_what_we_do_3: Guidance platform that connects insights to action.
about_how_it_works_1: Assessments: Big Five + Holland Codes with contextual prompts.
about_how_it_works_2: Insight Engine: Maps scores to live job data and talent needs.
about_how_it_works_3: Action Plan: Personalized learning paths and roadmap guidance.
about_vision_text: Make career clarity accessible through timeless wisdom plus modern intelligence.
about_mission_text: Equip every learner with culturally-aware guidance, actionable data, and inspiring storytelling.
about_roadmap_intro: Your journey with SIA begins with self-discovery and leads to actionable career guidance. Here's how we transform insights into your personalized career path:
about_step_1_desc: Take our comprehensive psychometric tests combining Big Five personality traits and Holland Codes to understand your unique profile.
about_step_2_desc: Our insight engine maps your results to real job market data, identifying careers that align with your personality and interests.
about_step_3_desc: Receive a personalized learning path with recommended courses, skills to develop, and resources tailored to your career goals.
about_step_4_desc: Start your journey with curated YouTube channels, books, articles, and courses designed to help you succeed in your chosen field.
about_team_lead: Our mosaic layout mirrors the collaboration between research, design, engineering, and storytelling.
about_contact_text: Have a partnership idea or want early access to the roadmap? Email us and we will respond within two business days.
privacy_subtitle: Your privacy and our terms of service
privacy_policy_text: At SIA, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. We collect basic data such as your name, email, and assessment results to ensure a personalized and secure experience. This information is used to provide tailored learning recommendations, manage accounts, and continuously improve the platform. All data is stored securely and will not be shared with third parties without your consent.
privacy_terms_intro: By using the SIA platform, you agree to the following terms:
privacy_terms_1: The content provided is for educational and guidance purposes only and does not constitute professional or medical advice.
privacy_terms_2: You must use your personal account and not share your login credentials with others.
privacy_terms_3: SIA reserves the right to modify the platform and its content at any time without prior notice.
privacy_terms_4: Any attempt to misuse the platform or disrupt its services may result in account suspension.
privacy_terms_5: All rights reserved by SIA – Ancient Wisdom for Modern Careers.
privacy_contact_text: For any questions or requests regarding privacy or terms of use, please contact us via the official platform email.
error_404_subtitle: The page you're looking for has been lost in the sands of time.
error_access_denied_subtitle: You do not have permission to view this page.
error_access_denied_message: Please log in with the correct role or return to the home page.
error_500_message: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
template_desc: This main section is a placeholder for future SIA content. Replace it with hero sections, feature grids, forms, or any custom layout needed for your new page.
